description:
This course is aimed to give you an introduction into the world of Forex trading. To become a successful trader, you must have variety of attributes, this course aims to give you an insight into what those attributes are and how you as an individual can fully benefit. Every trader is different, this course will help you identify what kind of trader you will be and what areas to focus on.

You should take this course if you are interested in becoming a trader, either as a profession or to supplement your income. This will give you a good grounding about what it takes to become a trader.


This course is made up of 15 sections:

Get Started Trading Tools (00:04:57)

  • Access important trading tools before you get started
  • Interview with a trader
  • Trading tools (Risk calculator / Trade plan template / Trade Journal)
  • Virtual trading floor access

Introduction & Contents Page (00:12:17)

  • Who we are and how we can help you with your education
  • A guide as to what you will get from the course

Success Stories (00:15:59)

  • An insight into how professional traders think
  • As well as what they have been through to become successful

Meet the Team (00:14:41)

  • Meet our team of traders
  • What they have been through to be successful
  • Their lows and highs

How to make a living trading Forex (00:12:26)

  • Steps to success
  • Rules of the game
  • Mastering probability
  • Compounding

Risk Management (00:16:57)

  • What is risk management
  • How to correctly size your trades
  • What is money management
  • What are stop loss and targets used for

Technical Analysis Part 1 (00:16:36)

  • Types of charts & candlesticks
  • Bulls vs Bears
  • Definition of certain market conditions (trending vs sideways)

Technical Analysis Part 2 (00:16:37)

  • Support and resistance
  • Trend lines
  • Fibonacci

Strategies (00:17:40)

  • Fibonacci C-D counter trend line break
  • Fibonacci fade 

Psychology (00:16:58)

  • The importance of psychology in trading
  • 8 Golden rules of trading

5 Key steps to successful trading (00:14:27)

Personality styles (00:11:26)

  • The 4 different personality styles
  • Why psychology is so important

Successful Vs unsuccessful traders (00:13:52)

  • Successful trader traits
  • Unsuccessful trader traits
  • Belief system

Developing the correct psychological mind set (00:15:27)

  • Difference between you and the masses

Goal Setting and the Next steps (00:13:36)

  • Importance of goal setting
  • Vision boards
  • The next steps
  • Further education
title: Introductory Forex Trading Course
